remarks.para: May be damaged or missing provided procedures are established and used to verify the associated cargo compartment remains empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULDs), or Fly Away Kits.

note.para: UPS does not carry Fly Away Kits in voided cargo compartments.

numlitem.para: Associated lower cargo compartment is empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment.

placard.para: Placard below captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "______ PANELS DAMAGED/MISSING IN ______ LOWER COMPARTMENT". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
